javadoc: Buffer provides a general purpose storage buffer interface providing various data access methods.

methods.javadoc:
Get the buffer ID for this buffer.
@return int
methods.name: getId
methods.comment: Get the buffer ID for this buffer.

methods.name: length
methods.comment:
Get the length of the buffer in bytes.  The length reflects the number of
 bytes which have been allocated to the buffer.

methods.name: get
methods.comment:
Get the byte data located at the specified offset and store into the
 bytes array provided.

params.name: offset
params.comment: byte offset from start of buffer.

params.name: bytes
params.comment: byte array to store data

throws.comment:
is thrown if an error occurs while accessing the
 underlying storage.

methods.name: get
methods.comment:
Get the byte data located at the specified offset and store into the data
 array  at the specified data offset.

params.name: offset
params.comment: byte offset from the start of the buffer.

params.name: data
params.comment: byte array to store the data.

params.name: dataOffset
params.comment: offset into the data buffer

params.name: length
params.comment: amount of data to read

throws.comment:
is thrown if an error occurs while accessing the
 underlying storage.

methods.name: get
methods.comment: Get the byte data located at the specified offset.

params.name: offset
params.comment: byte offset from start of buffer.

throws.comment:
is thrown if an error occurs while accessing the
 underlying storage.

methods.name: getByte
methods.comment: Get the 8-bit byte value located at the specified offset.

params.name: offset
params.comment: byte offset from start of buffer.

throws.comment:
is thrown if an error occurs while accessing the
 underlying storage.

return.comment: the byte value at the specified offset.

methods.name: getInt
methods.comment: Get the 32-bit integer value located at the specified offset.

params.name: offset
params.comment: byte offset from start of buffer.

throws.comment:
is thrown if an error occurs while accessing the
 underlying storage.

return.comment: the integer value at the specified offset.

methods.name: getShort
methods.comment: Get the 16-bit short value located at the specified offset.

params.name: offset
params.comment: byte offset from start of buffer.

throws.comment:
is thrown if an error occurs while accessing the
 underlying storage.

return.comment: the short value at the specified offset.

methods.name: getLong
methods.comment: Get the 64-bit long value located at the specified offset.

params.name: offset
params.comment: byte offset from start of buffer.

throws.comment:
is thrown if an error occurs while accessing the
 underlying storage.

return.comment: the long value at the specified offset.

methods.name: put
methods.comment:
Put a specified number of bytes from the array provided into the buffer
 at the specified offset.  The number of bytes stored is specified by the
 length specified.

params.name: offset
params.comment: byte offset from start of buffer.

params.name: data
params.comment: the byte data to be stored.

params.name: dataOffset
params.comment: the starting offset into the data.

params.name: length
params.comment: the number of bytes to be stored.

throws.comment:
is thrown if an error occurs while accessing the
 underlying storage.

return.comment:
the next available offset into the buffer, or -1 if the buffer is
 full.

methods.name: put
methods.comment:
Put the bytes provided into the buffer at the specified offset. The
 number of bytes stored is determined by the length of the bytes
 array.

params.name: offset
params.comment: byte offset from start of buffer.

params.name: bytes
params.comment: the byte data to be stored.

throws.comment:
is thrown if an error occurs while accessing the
 underlying storage.

return.comment:
the next available offset into the buffer, or -1 if the buffer is
 full.

methods.name: putByte
methods.comment: Put the 8-bit byte value into the buffer at the specified offset.

params.name: offset
params.comment: byte offset from start of buffer.

params.name: b
params.comment: the byte value to be stored.

throws.comment:
is thrown if an error occurs while accessing the
 underlying storage.

return.comment:
the next available offset into the buffer, or -1 if the buffer is
 full.

methods.name: putInt
methods.comment: Put the 32-bit integer value into the buffer at the specified offset.

params.name: offset
params.comment: byte offset from start of buffer.

params.name: v
params.comment: the integer value to be stored.

throws.comment:
is thrown if an error occurs while accessing the
 underlying storage.

return.comment:
the next available offset into the buffer, or -1 if the buffer is
 full.

methods.name: putShort
methods.comment: Put the 16-bit short value into the buffer at the specified offset.

params.name: offset
params.comment: byte offset from start of buffer.

params.name: v
params.comment: the short value to be stored.

throws.comment:
is thrown if an error occurs while accessing the
 underlying storage.

return.comment:
the next available offset into the buffer, or -1 if the buffer is
 full.

methods.name: putLong
methods.comment: Put the 64-bit long value into the buffer at the specified offset.

params.name: offset
params.comment: byte offset from start of buffer.

params.name: v
params.comment: the long value to be stored.

throws.comment:
is thrown if an error occurs while accessing the
 underlying storage.

return.comment:
the next available offset into the buffer, or -1 if the buffer is
 full.

name: Buffer
comment:
Buffer provides a general purpose storage buffer interface
 providing various data access methods.
